DOC.brief_summary: The Effectiveness of Adopting Humanized Service Program on Transabdominal Ultrasound About Pregnant Women's Service Quality and Satisfaction
DOC.brief_title: The Effectiveness of Adopting Humanized Service Program on Transabdominal Ultrasound About Pregnant Women's Service Quality and Satisfaction
DOC.criteria: 1. Adult over the age of 20 pregnant women. 2. Clear consciousness, those without severe cognitive impairment, such as dementia, mental retardation or mental illness. 3. Literacy and the use of Chinese or Taiwanese. 4. Willingness to participate in the research. Refused to participate in the research
